channel.title: Anybody know how to plant a series of .VOB and other files on a DVD?
channel.description:
Anybody know how to plant a series of .VOB and other files on a DVD?
Here are the files.
Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VIDEO_TS.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VIDEO_TS.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VIDEO_TS.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_01_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_01_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_01_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_01_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_02_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_02_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_02_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_02_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_03_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_03_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_03_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_03_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_2.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_04_3.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_05_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_05_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_05_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_05_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_06_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_06_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_06_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_06_1.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_07_0.BUP Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_07_0.IFO Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_07_0.VOB Filetype icon QUESTFORFIRE/VTS_07_1.VOB
Is there any way to do this? Oh and for me this is legal to download since I originally bought the DVD and it broke. :(
Thanks in advance.
~Ron
